title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 517.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 517.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) With the
exception of section
517.10, this Part applies to
transfer or other change of accommodation of a patient from a psychiatric
hospital to a psychiatric hospital other than Mid-Hudson Psychiatric Center
(transfer to which is governed by Part 57 of this Title). This Part replaces

Part 17 of this Title as it relates to such transfers and changes of
accommodation. (b) Section
517.10
of this Part applies to
facilities, agencies or programs, other than psychiatric hospitals, which refer
patients for admission to a State-operated psychiatric center. Such facilities, agencies or programs may or may not be certified by the Office of Mental

Health. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
517.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
